subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: At the Knicks’ first summer league practice, Mike Woodson talked as if the team had already matched the four-year, $28.8 million offer sheet Jeremy Lin agreed to sign with Houston.
snippet: At the Knicks’ first summer league practice, Mike Woodson talked as if the team had already matched the four-year, $28.8 million offer sheet Jeremy Lin agreed to sign with Houston.
